item.title: Need to research these online IDEs
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Suddenly got requirement to do IDE (edit, compile, debug, etc) online, i.e. without native software installed, then came across this site, haven’t read through, though. I think one of the most important feature to me is it has to work with Pad, that will make one’s life really interesting.
item.content:encoded:
Suddenly got requirement to do IDE (edit, compile, debug, etc) online, i.e. without native software installed, then came across this site, haven’t read through, though.

I think one of the most important feature to me is it has to work with Pad, that will make one’s life really interesting.

item.title: Nice online tool for GIF editing
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: lunapic.com is a nice tool to do image editing, though I just tested animated GIF editing job, if you don’t have a good native software in hand, this could be your best choice.
item.content:encoded: lunapic.com is a nice tool to do image editing, though I just tested animated GIF editing job, if you don’t have a good native software in hand, this could be your best choice.
